meanings.definition: The act of hitting or attacking someone or something with force.
meanings.sent1: The strikings of the hammer on the nail were loud.
meanings.sent2: The boxer's powerful strikings knocked out his opponent.
meanings.sent3: The strikings of the toddler's tiny fists on the table made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The strikings of the storm on the old house were relentless.
meanings.sent5: The strikings of the drum created a rhythmic beat.

meanings.definition: The noticeable or impressive features or characteristics of something.
meanings.sent1: The strikings of the painting caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The strikings of the mountain range were breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The strikings of the clown's outfit made the children laugh.
meanings.sent4: The strikings of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The strikings of the diamond sparkled in the light.

meanings.definition: The act of stopping work in order to protest or demand better conditions.
meanings.sent1: The workers organized strikings for fair wages.
meanings.sent2: The strikings of the employees led to negotiations with the management.
meanings.sent3: The strikings for longer lunch breaks were successful.
meanings.sent4: The strikings of the workers echoed through the factory.
meanings.sent5: The strikings of the protest were heard by the entire city.
